item.text: * ENTER Other
Timing of meds: current time of day is not a good time

Confirm client knows:
  1. Better tiime of day identified to take ART
  2. Remember if you forget you can take it within the next 12 hoours
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Forgets to take ART

Confirm client knows:
  1. Set med reminder on phone
  2. Use a calender to set a reminder
  3. Ask question to remind them of meds
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
I don't have a guardian to help me

Confirm client knows:
  1. How to identify a trustworthy guardian
  2. We can help advise them how to do disclosure or sit with them and do disclosure
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Treatment fatigue. Client is tired of taking treament every day

Confirm client knows:
  1. Counsel with IBM, motivation part critical to support taking medication for life
  2. Find out what part of taking medication is tiresome
  3. Refer to support group
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Mental health issues - Worries, fears, sadness, suicidal thoughts, etc

1. If suicidal - escort to clinician immediately
  2. Other LIVES support
Refer to a clinical provider
Child asking about ART - needs disclosure
1. Refer to disclosure trained site level staff to discuss and ideally complete disclosure with the child and family
Unable to take ART because no privacy and has been unable to disclose

Strategize with client:
  1. SAY: Everyone on ART has some concern about disclosure. You are not alone
  2. Verify who is a trustworthy person who can support you?
  3. Ask if we can help them disclose and share tips on how to disclose
  4. Remind them to discuss this concern with PSC when they chat
  5. Can you find another more private time of day and move meds to that time
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Miss appointments for refills

1. Welcome the client to care
  2. PROVIDE welcome service counselling
  3. Welcome card opened for back to care
Did you complete all the tasks listed above?
Reason Client Missed Appoinment
* Select and discuss the reason(s) the client missed their appointment

valueCoding.display: Has not disclosed to anyone so could not get away to clinic as people will notice
Using traditional medicine for healing
Religious reasons (faith healing) make it difficult for me
Lack of or delayed disclosure of status in children impacting adherence e.g child refusing treatment
Experience discrimination or stigma because of their HIV status
Experience discrimination or stigma because they have previously disengage or had IIT and feared coming back to clinic
Lack of reliable guardian for children e.g Multiple caregivers or unstable homes for children/OVC
Side effects that impact adherence
Forgot when their next appointment was
Could not get to clinic on their scheduled appointment date
Treatment fatigue. Client is tired of taking treatment every day
Mental health issues - Worries, fears, sadness, suicidal thoughts, etc
Did not actually miss ART dose (had ART supply) - NOT IIT
Other
None of the above

item.text: * ENTER Other
Side effects that impact adherence
SAY Side effects can occur . Other ART is available if you need it. Let's go to the clinician
ACTION: Escort client to clinical provider
Has not disclosed to anyone so could not get away to clinic as people will notice

SAY Everyone on ART has some concern about disclosure. You're not alone.
Verify who is a trust worthy person who can support you?
Ask if we can help them disclose and share tips on how to disclose
Remind them to disucss this concern with PSC when they chat
Ask if they'd like to meet someone at clinic who is on ART to share experience?
Ask if they'd like info on support group
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Using Traditional Medicine For Healing

EXPLAIN that many people use traditional medicine to treat many aiments like diarrhoea and pain, or to try boost immunity. However, nothing can cure HIV
ART weakens HIV. Traditional medicines can interfere with ART and reduce the effect of ART in the body
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
ACTION Refer to a clinic provider
Religious reasons (faith healing) make it difficult for me

COUNSEL
Faith is an important part of healing and health and it is so important that you have this support. God cares for us in many ways. Just as God provides us food on this earth, we don't depend on God to keep us nourished but know he has put food here for us to eat. God has also provided people on this earth who make ART that controls the virus. God is giving us what we need to stay healthy. Do you think God would want you to use these medications with your prayers and faith and community to stay healthy?
ACTION Refer to a clinic provider
Lack of or delayed disclosure of status in children impacting adherence e.g child refusing treatment

1. DISCUSS benefits of disclosure and initiate disclosure if ok with guardian
  2. Enrol in teen club/youth supporter program/OVC program after FULL disclosure confirmed
  3. Continue supporting disclosure process throughout adolescence
  4. Reinforce guardian support for the child after disclosure
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
ACTION Link to OVC program (APA or other)
Experience discrimination or stigma because of their HIV status

1. Tell the client: I am sorry this happened to you. It is NOT YOUR FAULT that someone was mean to you and discriminated against you. You did not do anything to deserve this
  2. Ask the client what do they think they can do to cope with discrimination if it happens again. Sometimes we cannot change others behaviour but we can minimise its effect on us
Refer to a clinical provider
Experience discrimination or stigma because they have previously disengage or had IIT and feared coming back to clinic
Tell the client: It is NOT YOUR FAULT that someone was mean to you and discriminated against you. You did not do anything to deserve this
Accompany client to provider
Lack of reliable guardian for children e.g Multiple caregivers or unstable homes for children/OVC

1. COUNSEL: Children are VULNERABLE and completely dependent on adults
  2. We KNOW that it is hard to always remember ART for children and that sometimes emergencies happen and we are not available
  3. This is why it is SO IMPORTANT that AT LEAST 2 people know and check every day that ART is given
  4. Who are the 2 caregivers for this child? How do you work together to give the ART daily? WRITE ON b3c cards
  5. Identity 2+ care givers and help guardian think about how other caregivers can help them. Plan preART for all guardians
  6. If complex refer to clinician
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
ACTION Link to OVC program (APA or other)
Side effects that impact adherence
SAY: Side effects can occur. Other ART is available if you need it. Let's go to the clinician
ACTION: Escort client to clinical provider
Forgot when their next appointment was

1. Set appointment reminder on phone
  2. Use calender to set a reminder
  3. Ask guardian to remind them of the appointment
  4. CHW can call if the client has a phone
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Could not get to clinic on their scheduled appointment date
Why could they not get to the clinic on their scheduled appointment date?

valueCoding.display: Unable to get off work or school
Competing priorities - e.g business, working for difficult employers
Travel (in and out of the area or over holidays)
Temporarily relocated
Lack of transport funds

item.text:
1. Attend appointment on possible day before scheduled date
  2. Weekend appointment
  3. Early morning or lunch hour clinic if available
  4. Call clinic to notify of missing appointment but has enough meds
  5. Ask providers for next visit on best time of the week or month to set appointment

1. Attend appointment before scheduled date
  2. Emergency refill
  3. MMS
  4. Notify clinic if missing appointment
  5. Ask providers for next visit on best time of the week or month to set appointment

1. Emergency refill
  2. Refill at Drop in centre/KP programs and seek assistance from CBOs
  3. Transfer out to nearby clinic
  4. Call clinic to notify of situation

1. Ask for next appointment date after pay day
  2. Flash clinic if you will miss appointment to let them know
  3. Ask for MMS
  4. Move to clinic closer to home/CAD
Treatment fatigue. Client is tired of taking treatment every day

1. Counsel with IMB motivation part critical to support taking medication for life
  2. Refer to PSC
  3. Refer to support group
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Mental health issues - Worries, fears, sadness, suicidal thoughts, etc

1. Refer to PSC
  2. If suicidal - escort to clinician immediately
  3. Refer to the clinical provider
Did not actually miss ART dose (had ART supply) - NOT IIT
Why is the client not IIT

valueCoding.display: Had meds from this clinic
Borrowed meds

item.text:
1. Encourage the client to continue coming to the clinic as indicated. ACTION: Correct the EMR before client leaves today
  2. SAY: Great job coming to clinic before your ART finished. Please try to come when you have at least 2 tabs remaining so if there is any reason you cannot get to clinic when you plan, then you will still have some doses. Don't want until meds are all gone
  3. Show the clinician how many tabs you have and they will give you a later clinic date

1. Praise the client for not missing doses and review importance of not sharing meds and not all ART is the same
  2. Review their ART name
Did you discuss everything listed with the client?
Psychosocial Counsellor
* <b>SAY:<b>We have PSC who supports all clients and would like you to have an opportunity to talk to them today. Is it ok with you if I call them now while you are waiting for the clinication
ACTION Refer client to PSC
* Did you refer the client to a psychosocial counselor?
* Is welcome care follow up needed?

Write in passbook PSC today: name of PSC;
reason;
is followup needed yes/no
Get Task
